H2.text: who wrote antigone and what are the dates of his birth and death. Aristophanes

H3.text: who wrote antigone and what are the dates of his birth and death. Sophocles

A4.text: Sophocles wrote more than 120 plays, but only seven have survived in a complete form: Ajax, Antigone, Women of Trachis, Oedipus Rex, Electra, Philoctetes, and Oedipus at Colonus.

A5.text: The most famous tragedies of Sophocles feature Oedipus and Antigone: they are generally known as the Theban plays.
